title: Drawing Request Thread
body:
It's been a while since I have done one of these. I wanted to work with emotions again, but with this new style I have going.

Please post one champion and perhaps... 2 emotions (just in case I get stuck)

These will be:
Funny looking and not too proportionate.
bust/headshot size.
May not be in color.

Bring it in, and please bring me company with some convo or something.

http://i.imgur.com/ZqYp5Gy.png

http://i.imgur.com/DuOTngG.png

http://i.imgur.com/F3OHHgZ.png

http://i.imgur.com/D7iLyjs.png
